title: ReLIFE: Kanketsu-hen
synopsis: After reliving the life of a high school student through the ReLIFE experiment, 27-year-old Arata Kaizaki cannot believe how quickly it has changed him. He has begun to see the world through a different perspective that he had completely forgotten as an adult. He has made friends and formed deep relationships with each one of them. However his support, Ryou Yoake, reminds him that the experiment is all an illusion; after his experiment ends, he will be forgotten by all of them.
characters: ['Hishiro, Chizuru', 'Kaizaki, Arata', 'Onoya, An', 'Yoake, Ryou', 'Kariu, Rena', 'Ooga, Kazuomi', 'Inukai, Akira', 'Tamarai, Honoka', 'Amatsu, Kokoro', 'Asaji, Nobunaga']
